description: Available NOW | Elegant & spacious two bedroom apartment located in the heart of Central London where everything the city has to offer is at your finger-tips within Hanway Street Conservation Area in Fitzrovia. <PARA> Spread over an impressive 1,300 sq.ft this elegant two bedroom, two bathroom apartment is the perfect home for someone looking to be located in the heart of London. Located on a side road off London's infamous Oxford Street, Hanway Garden is a quite and boutique development where upon walking up to the buildings entrance you could be forgiven for thinking you miles from the hustle and bustle of Oxford Street As you make your way passed the charming daytime concierge and through the lift you reach the entrance to this charming and spacious apartment. <PARA> Upon entering, you are immediately drawn to the bright and spacious living room that is simply perfect for hosting family and friends or just relaxing after a hectic week of working. The kitchen is perfectly positioned for any budding chefs as the large and deep kitchen counter offers you the ability to cook up a gourmet meal but still be directly connected with the event occurring in the living room. The kitchen is fitted with all the modern appliances you would expect including induction hob, oven, fridge/freezer, dishwasher and wine cooler. The living room also offers direct views onto Oxford Street, where you can watch the word go by. <PARA> The second bedroom is located to the corner of the living room and is of excellent size and comes with a bespoke fitted wardrobe. The room is currently set-up as a work-from-home office but can easily be repositioned as a formal bedroom. This room also has access to an en-suite finished with refined and elegant porcelain marble tiles in a palette choice of Anima Bianco wall and floor tiling and a walk-in shower. As we leave the second bedroom a separate utility room can be found, with sink and washer/dryer making it the perfect place to hide away the laundry from the week. <PARA> Towards the rear of the apartment is the principal bedroom suite. This room is oversized by new development standard and offers plenty of built-in storage and a huge en-suite offered with his and hers hand basins, walk-in shower and a separate and elegant bathtub finished to the same standard as seen in the second bedroom en-suite. <PARA> Offering a colourful mixture of cosy pubs, media offices, boutique hotels such as The Sanderson, and the major shopping street of Oxford Street, Fitzrovia is bursting with bohemian character and classic London charm. From award-winning restaurants such as ROKA on Charlotte Street, to the BT Tower – one of London’s tallest and most famous buildings – it is no wonder that this West End enclave continues to attract artists, creatives and professionals alike. <PARA> Disclaimer <PARA> These particulars are intended to give a fair description of the property but their accuracy cannot be guaranteed and they do not constitute an offer of contract. Intending purchasers must rely on their own inspection of the property. <PARA> None of the above appliances/services have been tested by Romans & Partners. We recommend purchasers arrange for a qualified person to check all appliances/services before making any legal commitment.
